PATIENT_ID: TEST_PEN_ABD_NC_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-28 18:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-28 18:05:00
Category I activation for 26-year-old male with penetrating abdominal injury.
GSW to anterior abdomen. Hemodynamic instability on arrival.
BP 76/42, HR 148, RR 30, GCS 14.
Entry wound anterior abdominal wall. Peritoneal signs on exam.
Wound location in left lower abdominal quadrant.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-28 18:10:00
No CT obtained. No FAST performed. Patient taken directly to OR.
Operating room without imaging. No CT or FAST before surgery.
Taken to OR without imaging evaluation.

[OPERATIVE_NOTE] 2026-02-28 18:20:00
Emergent laparotomy performed. Operative decision made.
Bowel injuries identified and repaired.
No pre-operative imaging obtained.
